name: THE NEWS LITERACY PROJECT
description: A nonpartisan education nonprofit to advance the practice of news literacy in the U.S.
sampleDescriptions: To increase awareness of news literacy on Capitol Hill and within the Executive Branch and encourage programs at the K-12 educational level.
Awareness of news literacy education curriculum for K-12 students and teachers.
